original_title: Papà Ugo - I Gregoretti si raccontano
overview: An unusual portrait of Ugo Gregoretti, actor, film, television and theater director, and father of 5 children. His children and his wife tell us about him, going through the years spent together, talking about his irony and tenderness, his indulgence and his ability to make people smile.
title: Papà Ugo - I Gregoretti si raccontano
